Mission and Purpose

To develop skills for the critical analysis of the Mexican reality, from studying individually and collaboratively the sociopolitical, economical and cultural context, with the purpose of proposing alternative solutions to issues and development of the country, developing attitudes of ethical analysis, thinking, participation and accountability.

Specializations and activities

Lectures, forums and debates

Major projects and events

Festival de participación ciudadana
